title: AI珍奶來襲

panels.scene_description: A bustling street in Taiwan, filled with hand-shaken tea shops. A traditional tea shop owner, sweaty and overworked, is struggling to keep up with orders. His face is filled with exhaustion.
panels.dialogue: 老闆：(Panting) Another bubble tea! These customers are relentless! My hands are cramping!
panels.narrative_function: Introducing the traditional hand-shaken tea shop owner and the overwhelming demand.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters. Panel 1: A busy street in Taiwan with many hand-shaken tea shops. A stressed and sweaty tea shop owner is overwhelmed by orders.

panels.scene_description: The same street, but now a gleaming, futuristic AI-powered bubble tea kiosk stands next to the traditional shop. A sleek robot arm is effortlessly making bubble tea at lightning speed. Customers are lined up at the AI kiosk.
panels.dialogue:
Customer 1: Wow, this AI bubble tea is so fast! And perfectly customized! 
Customer 2: I heard they never get the sugar level wrong!
panels.narrative_function: Introducing the AI bubble tea robot and its efficiency, contrasting it with the traditional shop.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters. Panel 2: A futuristic AI-powered bubble tea kiosk next to the traditional shop. A robot arm is quickly making bubble tea. Customers are lining up, impressed.

panels.scene_description: Close-up on the traditional tea shop owner, now staring in disbelief at the AI kiosk. He is holding a wilting tea leaf and his face is filled with despair.
panels.dialogue: 老闆：(Whispering) No... they're... they're perfect... They even remember my regulars' orders better than I do!
panels.narrative_function: Showing the tea shop owner's reaction to the AI competition and his fear of being replaced.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters. Panel 3: Close-up on the tea shop owner, staring in disbelief at the AI kiosk. He is holding a wilting tea leaf, looking despairing.

panels.scene_description: The tea shop owner is now wearing a futuristic headset and apron. He is standing proudly in front of his shop, which is now equipped with several robot arms. He winks at the audience.
panels.dialogue: 老闆：Alright, new strategy! If you can't beat 'em, join 'em! Now, let's see these robots learn the SECRET family recipe!
panels.narrative_function: The tea shop owner embraces AI and adapts to the new technology with a mischievous grin.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters. Panel 4: The tea shop owner is now wearing a headset and apron, standing proudly in front of his shop equipped with robot arms. He winks at the audience.

overall_style: Humorous and satirical, with a lighthearted take on the AI revolution in the bubble tea industry.
